content: Is it possible to use SUSHI to create profiles and IGs with the STU3 specification for FHIR? I haven't been able to find a way to get the STU Core packages to resolve when executeing the SUSHI command. My IG builds fine with R4 but need to produce this in STU3. Any help is much appreciated.
It is better to ask in #shorthand stream.
Thanks @Yunwei Wang , I didn't know about that stream. Found the answer immediately. STU3 not supported in SUSHI.
